info.title: WeatherAPI.com
info.description:
WeatherAPI.com provides access to weather and geo data via a JSON/XML restful API. It allows developers to create desktop, web and mobile applications using this data very easy. We provide the following data through our API:

- Real-time weather
- 14 day weather forecast
- Historical Weather
- Marine Weather and Tide Data
- Future Weather (Up to 365 days ahead)
- Daily and hourly intervals
- 15 min interval (Enterprise only)
- Astronomy
- Time zone
- Location data
- Sports
- Search or Autocomplete API
- Weather Alerts
- Air Quality Data
- Bulk Request

get.description: Current weather or real-time weather API method allows to get today's current time weather info, contains current or realtime weather information for a given city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Pass US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name. Visit request parameter section to learn more.

get.summary: Retrieve weather forecast information for upto 14 days from today's date and not more, if you need for days more that 14, choose future API
get.description: Forecast weather API method gives maximum up to the next 14-day weather forecast, more than 14 days, use future weather API. Forecast object contains astronomy data, day weather forecast, and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Pass US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name. Visit request parameter section to learn more.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days of weather forecast. Value ranges from 1 to 14, for today's forecast number is 1, for tomorrow, it is 2 and so on

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Date should be between today and next 14 days in yyyy-MM-dd format. e.g. '2015-01-01'

parameters.name: unixdt
parameters.description: Please either pass 'dt' or 'unixdt' and not both in the same request. Unixdt should be between today and next 14 days in Unix format. e.g. 1490227200

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Must be in 24 hour format. For example, 5 pm should be hour=17, 6 am as hour=6.

parameters.name: aqi
parameters.description: Enable/Disable Air Quality data in forecast API output. Example, aqi=yes or aqi=no.

get.summary: Retrieve future weather information for dates after 14 days from today's date, if specified data is less than 14 from today, use forecast api
get.description: Future weather API method returns weather for future for a date between 14 days and 365 days from today in the future, in a 3 hourly interval in .

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Pass US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name. Visit request parameter section to learn more.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Date should be between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future in yyyy-MM-dd format (i.e. dt=2023-01-01).

get.description: Use this to get weather data for dates that are before today's date, for past data weather data.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Pass US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name. Visit request parameter section to learn more.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Date on or after 1st Jan, 2015 in yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: end_dt
parameters.description: Date on or after 1st Jan, 2015 in yyyy-MM-dd format. 'end_dt' should be greater than 'dt' parameter and difference should not be more than 30 days between the two dates.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Must be in 24 hour. For example 5 pm should be hour=17, 6 am as hour=6.
